name: The story of a good girl v 0.2
name_original: The story of a good girl v 0.2
description:
This is a story about a girl who lives in difficult conditions. She tries to stay good and kind. But life itself often presents her unpleasant surprises. What will be the fate of this girl? Will external circumstances affect her character? 
As the development will be added alternative versions of the event, characters, choises. Of course, this implies several endings. 

On my page on the Patreon there is also a Russian version.

For adults (18+) only!
